description:
This course will teach you how to turn a basic WordPress Blog into a simple, stunning website. We will use, must have plugins to be able to create the look and feel for your brand new site. I have included in this course the simple codes, URLs and tools you need so you can copy and paste and become a professional when it comes to editing any WordPress Blog. You don't need to know how to code, we are just making edits to codes.

My simple advanced course is structured for All Levels with simple and clear videos that take you step by step in creating your website from after installation of WordPress to completion of your brand new website. Each video lecture is short and to the point and designed to take you by the hand and help you understand the basics to simple advanced blog training.

Completion of this course is around 4 to 5 hours of video training. Each video is designed to flow right into the next one so you won't miss a beat with my step by step instructions. Always watch each video lecture a couple times to let your new website training sink in. You'll be a professional website builder in no time.

You should take this course if you want real, down to earth website training at a pace that's perfect for learning. WordPress sites are so popular and rank number one at building websites for people with an imagination. The reason WordPress is so popular is because of all the Themes and Plugins available to make your website do things that only a person NOT using WordPress would only dream of. Your imagination can take you wherever you want to go when it comes to building a nice website for the world to see. So I suggest you take my course, get back to the basics and learn some new advanced techniques to become a professional website designer. Thank you and see you on the inside.
title: Simple Advanced WP Blog Training
